name: Fall Of Civilization (itch)
description:
Hey, 

Thanks for checking it out my project, this game is a build & defend style game, where you build to gather resources, and use resources to defend against hordes of enemies. 

Tip: 

Place Stone harvester near stone, and wood harvester near trees, if you want them to produce stone, or wood.

I will be releasing a game every month for the rest of the year, and to see the progress feel free to check out(I post daily):

Discord: https://discord.gg/WygjXgYh96

Devlog: https://tyrantswrath.blogspot.com/

Controls:

Scroll up-down to zoom in and zoom out

use the UI to place buildings. 

UI Design By: Lynda Mc Donald
